title: Trade Lefty Leifield Pitching P150F25 for SC Back?
author: Marslife

posts.post_title: Trade Lefty Leifield Pitching P150F25 for SC Back?
posts.post_content:
Hey All!  I have a dupe Lefty Leifield Pitching P150 F25 SGC 30.  

I would like to trade for the same card in a Sweet Cap Back (any except sc350f30 which I have).

Let me know if there is any interest.  I would also consider a trade for any other Pirate players/back combinations I need for my team set.

thanks!

Cliff
